
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/CareySon/p/18711135" title="发布于 2025-02-12 10:53">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">开发中对象命名的一点思考</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<article class="4ever-article" data-clipboard-cangjie="[&quot;root&quot;,{&quot;userData&quot;:{&quot;10219830&quot;:{&quot;m6xqsskdu044ckgz4o&quot;:{&quot;fold&quot;:false}}}},[&quot;h3&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xqsskc2s4m1mj5h3r&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;引言&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xqsskcwetlzih6sug&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;在我所见过的项目中，大多数团队都倾向于“功能堆砌式”开发：需求来了就加逻辑或函数，却很少有人愿意花时间在设计上，尤其是在&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;对象命名&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;花费时间。这看似“快速实现需求”的方式，通常会对代码的可读性产生坏的影响，进而影响可维护性。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xqsskcrf4cjn63ch&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;一个好的对象命名&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;并非只是让代码表面看起来整洁；它背后关系到人类和 AI 对系统的认知方式，也会在后续维护和迭代中形塑程序员以及 AI 工具的行为。换句话说，合适的命名不但决定了当前代码的优雅程度，也会潜移默化地影响未来对代码进行修改、扩展和重构时的思维路径与决策过程。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xr0c4mw1ftgj5xjor&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;下面，我们将通过几个示例，探讨如何通过合理的命名让对象真正体现业务含义与自主决策能力，而不是简单地扮演一个“被动执行者”。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xsfet1gorcnkb3zv&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h2&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xqsskculd14jhr13r&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;一、避免以er或or结尾的对象命名&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m5nhi3mlxmy3egerwz&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;sz&quot;:12,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;color&quot;:&quot;rgb(0, 0, 0)&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;想象你走进一家餐厅。你会如何点餐？是要一份宫保鸡丁，还是告诉厨师：“你先放油，然后大火爆炒，然后再加调料”？如果你选择后者，那么对应到程序设计中，大概就是下面的写法：&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;java&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;class FoodMaker {\n    public Dish Cook(List<Step> cookingSteps) {\n        foreach(var step in cookingSteps) {\n            ExecuteStep(step);\n        }\n        return new Dish();\n    }\n}\n\n// 客户端代码\nvar maker = new FoodMaker();\nvar steps = new List<Step> {\n    new Step(\&quot;放油\&quot;), \n    new Step(\&quot;大火爆炒\&quot;), \n    new Step(\&quot;加调料\&quot;)\n};\nvar dish = maker.Cook(steps);&quot;,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m5nhi3mlbmgyi4ashcp&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;class FoodMaker {\n    public Dish Cook(List<Step> cookingSteps) {\n        foreach(var step in cookingSteps) {\n            ExecuteStep(step);\n        }\n        return new Dish();\n    }\n}\n\n// 客户端代码\nvar maker = new FoodMaker();\nvar steps = new List<Step> {\n    new Step(\&quot;放油\&quot;), \n    new Step(\&quot;大火爆炒\&quot;), \n    new Step(\&quot;加调料\&quot;)\n};\nvar dish = maker.Cook(steps);&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m5nhi3mlxsg4rzqjubh&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;sz&quot;:12,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;FoodMaker&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;sz&quot;:12,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;color&quot;:&quot;rgb(0, 0, 0)&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot; ，它只是一个“做饭的人”或“执行器”，缺乏更多的“主观能动性”。这不仅增加了使用者在思维层面的负担，也显得对专业厨师的经验和技能不够尊重。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xr890551vi0dtt6c6&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;sz&quot;:12,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;color&quot;:&quot;rgb(0, 0, 0)&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;相比之下，更贴近现实的方式是直接告诉对方“我需要一份宫保鸡丁”，厨师会根据自身经验和对食材的理解来完成这道菜。例如：&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;java&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;Chef {\n    public Dish PrepareKungPaoChicken() {\n        // 厨师知道如何准备这道菜\n        return new KungPaoChicken();\n    }\n}\n\n// 客户端代码\nvar chef = new Chef();\nvar dish = chef.PrepareKungPaoChicken();&quot;,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m5nhi3ml5yl1i0c0x6j&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;Chef {\n    public Dish PrepareKungPaoChicken() {\n        // 厨师知道如何准备这道菜\n        return new KungPaoChicken();\n    }\n}\n\n// 客户端代码\nvar chef = new Chef();\nvar dish = chef.PrepareKungPaoChicken();&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m5nhi3mlp8bieh53qe&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;sz&quot;:10.5,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;color&quot;:&quot;rgb(0, 0, 0)&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xr8wuc1h7vrcwne0o&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;sz&quot;:12,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;color&quot;:&quot;rgb(0, 0, 0)&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;这样，&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;sz&quot;:12,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;Chef&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;sz&quot;:12,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;color&quot;:&quot;rgb(0, 0, 0)&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot; 完整体现了专业性与自主性：&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;list&quot;:{&quot;listId&quot;:&quot;l3lklxupu3s&quot;,&quot;isOrdered&quot;:false,&quot;level&quot;:0,&quot;listStyle&quot;:{&quot;format&quot;:&quot;bullet&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;●&quot;,&quot;align&quot;:&quot;left&quot;},&quot;symbolStyle&quot;:{&quot;sz&quot;:12}},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xr8wucl81zeqlxkuq&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;sz&quot;:12,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;color&quot;:&quot;rgb(0, 0, 0)&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;角色名称直接让人联想到一个可自主决策、拥有专业技能的人，而非简单的“烹饪器”。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;list&quot;:{&quot;listId&quot;:&quot;l3lklxupu3s&quot;,&quot;isOrdered&quot;:false,&quot;level&quot;:0,&quot;listStyle&quot;:{&quot;format&quot;:&quot;bullet&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;●&quot;,&quot;align&quot;:&quot;left&quot;},&quot;symbolStyle&quot;:{&quot;sz&quot;:12}},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xr8wucwnny6zohu8o&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;sz&quot;:12,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;color&quot;:&quot;rgb(0, 0, 0)&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;客户端只需表达“想要什么菜品”，而不必详述所有步骤。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;list&quot;:{&quot;listId&quot;:&quot;l3lklxupu3s&quot;,&quot;isOrdered&quot;:false,&quot;level&quot;:0,&quot;listStyle&quot;:{&quot;format&quot;:&quot;bullet&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;●&quot;,&quot;align&quot;:&quot;left&quot;},&quot;symbolStyle&quot;:{&quot;sz&quot;:12}},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xr8wucisiponcarg9&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;sz&quot;:12,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;color&quot;:&quot;rgb(0, 0, 0)&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;厨师可以根据具体的食材和场景调整做菜细节，为业务带来更多灵活性。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xr8wud7cgzpraf6dh&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;sz&quot;:12,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;color&quot;:&quot;rgb(0, 0, 0)&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;值得注意的是，很多以 &quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;sz&quot;:12,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;color&quot;:&quot;rgb(0, 0, 0)&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;“-er”&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;sz&quot;:12,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;color&quot;:&quot;rgb(0, 0, 0)&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot; 或 &quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;sz&quot;:12,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;color&quot;:&quot;rgb(0, 0, 0)&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;“-or”&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;sz&quot;:12,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;color&quot;:&quot;rgb(0, 0, 0)&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot; 结尾的对象（如 &quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;sz&quot;:12,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;Manager、Processor、Controller、Validator&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;sz&quot;:12,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;color&quot;:&quot;rgb(0, 0, 0)&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot; 等）常常会呈现出类似的“过程化”倾向：&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;sz&quot;:12,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;color&quot;:&quot;rgb(0, 0, 0)&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;它们更多体现的是过程集合而非业务主体&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;sz&quot;:12,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;color&quot;:&quot;rgb(0, 0, 0)&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;。当我们把命名改为更能传达专业身份或业务角色的名词时，往往会看到对象的“自我意识”和“主观能动性”随之提升，从而让整个系统的抽象层次更高、可维护性更好。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xsgewkvyi35s5joek&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;sz&quot;:10.5,&quot;szUnit&quot;:&quot;pt&quot;,&quot;color&quot;:&quot;rgb(0, 0, 0)&quot;,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h2&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xqsskdu044ckgz4o&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;二、“Service”“Helper”“Utility”等后缀，更容易出现“上帝类”&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xrg1ymxhu23txx0pi&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;在 AI 辅助编程工具的普及下，命名的清晰度在大型项目中显得尤为重要。模糊或过于抽象的名字不仅会增加团队成员、甚至让3个月后的你自己的认知负担，也会让 AI 在大量上下文中难以理解该对象的真实意图，甚至产生误导性补全。我们先来看一个不恰当的示例：&quot;]]],[&quot;h3&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xrg1ymzf3rgotd2q&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;错误示例：RestaurantService 集合了一切琐事&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;java&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;public class RestaurantService {\n    // 名称看似管理餐厅的一切，却混合了做饭、送餐和财务等完全不同的功能\n\n    // 烹饪某道菜\n    public void cookDish(String dishName) {\n        \n    }\n\n    // 将菜品送到指定地址\n    public void deliverFood(String address) {\n        \n    }\n\n    // 安排厨师、服务员等员工的工作排班\n    public void scheduleStaff(String staffName, String shift) {\n        \n    }\n\n    // 处理餐厅每天或每月的财务结算\n    public void handleBilling() {\n        \n    }\n}\n&quot;,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xrg1ymxz98vxe9j3&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;public class RestaurantService {\n    // 名称看似管理餐厅的一切，却混合了做饭、送餐和财务等完全不同的功能\n\n    // 烹饪某道菜\n    public void cookDish(String dishName) {\n        \n    }\n\n    // 将菜品送到指定地址\n    public void deliverFood(String address) {\n        \n    }\n\n    // 安排厨师、服务员等员工的工作排班\n    public void scheduleStaff(String staffName, String shift) {\n        \n    }\n\n    // 处理餐厅每天或每月的财务结算\n    public void handleBilling() {\n        \n    }\n}\n&quot;]]],[&quot;h4&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xrg1ynej2ev7wyobd&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;问题：&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;list&quot;:{&quot;listId&quot;:&quot;er5j5tmcz3v&quot;,&quot;isOrdered&quot;:true,&quot;level&quot;:0,&quot;listStyle&quot;:{&quot;format&quot;:&quot;decimal&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;%1.&quot;,&quot;align&quot;:&quot;left&quot;}},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xrg1ynwrlzztntw5f&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;过于宽泛、抽象的类名&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;：RestaurantService 似乎负责所有与餐厅相关的功能，从做菜到送餐再到财务结算，远远超出了单一职责的范围。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;list&quot;:{&quot;listId&quot;:&quot;er5j5tmcz3v&quot;,&quot;isOrdered&quot;:true,&quot;level&quot;:0,&quot;listStyle&quot;:{&quot;format&quot;:&quot;decimal&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;%1.&quot;,&quot;align&quot;:&quot;left&quot;}},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xrg1ynz62vv911br&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;对 AI 的误导&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;：当 AI 工具在大规模代码库中搜索或补全时，见到“RestaurantService”可能以为这里面能找到任何与餐厅运营相关的逻辑，补全时也可能把更多不相干的功能（例如“采购食材”、“营销活动”等）一股脑塞进来，很容易导致上帝类。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;list&quot;:{&quot;listId&quot;:&quot;er5j5tmcz3v&quot;,&quot;isOrdered&quot;:true,&quot;level&quot;:0,&quot;listStyle&quot;:{&quot;format&quot;:&quot;decimal&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;%1.&quot;,&quot;align&quot;:&quot;left&quot;}},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xrg1yn5l920l8q6lm&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;难以维护与扩展&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;：假如将来要更改配送方式或财务记账逻辑，你会发现所有功能都耦合在同一个类里，一次改动极有可能波及整个系统。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xriijsby5i9550ucd&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h3&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xrg1yncjjrjm45as9&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;更合理的设计：按专业分工拆分类&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xrg1yn8hqofgdrxk5&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;要让代码更易读、更具可维护性，也让 AI 分析更准确，我们可以将“餐厅运营”按照现实场景拆分成多个专门对象，让每个类名更能“自证其职”：&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;java&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;// 专注做菜逻辑\npublic class Kitchen {\n    public void cookDish(String dishName) {\n        // 专业处理做菜流程\n    }\n}\n\n// 专注外卖配送\npublic class Delivery {\n    public void deliverFood(String address) {\n        // 专业处理送餐流程\n    }\n}\n\n// 专注人员排班\npublic class StaffScheduling {\n    public void schedule(String staffName, String shift) {\n        // 专业处理员工排班\n    }\n}\n\n// 专注财务结算\npublic class Billing {\n    public void settleAccounts() {\n        // 专门处理账务结算\n    }\n}\n&quot;,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xrg1yniylocu7s5xs&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;// 专注做菜逻辑\npublic class Kitchen {\n    public void cookDish(String dishName) {\n        // 专业处理做菜流程\n    }\n}\n\n// 专注外卖配送\npublic class Delivery {\n    public void deliverFood(String address) {\n        // 专业处理送餐流程\n    }\n}\n\n// 专注人员排班\npublic class StaffScheduling {\n    public void schedule(String staffName, String shift) {\n        // 专业处理员工排班\n    }\n}\n\n// 专注财务结算\npublic class Billing {\n    public void settleAccounts() {\n        // 专门处理账务结算\n    }\n}\n&quot;]]],[&quot;h4&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xrg1yn5kyio47y6ao&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;好处：&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;list&quot;:{&quot;listId&quot;:&quot;0f5z9swi324i&quot;,&quot;isOrdered&quot;:true,&quot;level&quot;:0,&quot;listStyle&quot;:{&quot;format&quot;:&quot;decimal&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;%1.&quot;,&quot;align&quot;:&quot;left&quot;}},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xrg1yopu9r53o8vxo&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;职责明确&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;：Kitchen 只做烹饪，Delivery 只管外卖，StaffScheduling 只负责排班，Billing 用于结算财务。每个对象都有清晰的专业领域。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;list&quot;:{&quot;listId&quot;:&quot;0f5z9swi324i&quot;,&quot;isOrdered&quot;:true,&quot;level&quot;:0,&quot;listStyle&quot;:{&quot;format&quot;:&quot;decimal&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;%1.&quot;,&quot;align&quot;:&quot;left&quot;}},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xrg1yogthzxhl4nwd&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;易于理解&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;：无论是人还是 AI，看到类名便能迅速推断其功能，降低误解。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;list&quot;:{&quot;listId&quot;:&quot;0f5z9swi324i&quot;,&quot;isOrdered&quot;:true,&quot;level&quot;:0,&quot;listStyle&quot;:{&quot;format&quot;:&quot;decimal&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;%1.&quot;,&quot;align&quot;:&quot;left&quot;}},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xrg1yoga4enu342ds&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;便于扩展&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;：将来需要为“配送”加入自动调度，或为“做菜”加入菜单推荐逻辑，也可以在对应的类中单独迭代，而不会影响其他模块。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;list&quot;:{&quot;listId&quot;:&quot;0f5z9swi324i&quot;,&quot;isOrdered&quot;:true,&quot;level&quot;:0,&quot;listStyle&quot;:{&quot;format&quot;:&quot;decimal&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;%1.&quot;,&quot;align&quot;:&quot;left&quot;}},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xrg1yooq59aad36jd&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;匹配现实场景&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;：现实中，餐厅的后厨、配送员、人事、财务等各司其职，软件设计中也应遵循类似原则。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xrkvzw066dy88dacno&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h2&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xqsskfcx6oo3n8g8&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;三、对象命名与对象“智能”属性：当环境变化时仍能自适应&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs569tjvv02ue43mc&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;现实生活中，若宫保鸡丁的必需食材（例如花生）突然缺货，真正的专业厨师会主动寻找替代食材，而不会要求顾客重新“下指令”或“换个点餐方式”。同理，在软件中，一个设计得足够“智能”的对象，也应该能在外部条件或业务需求变化时，自行调整内部逻辑，而不影响调用者的使用方式。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs5o5h3u4mrkg3x9c&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h4&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs569tq6v0jsjqjdd&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;示例：面相过程的烹饪&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;java&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;public class CookingProcess {\n    public Dish cook(String dishName) {\n        // 无论食材是否缺货，都执行固定步骤\n        // ...\n        return new Dish(dishName); // 返回做好的菜\n    }\n}\n&quot;,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs569tssppl5ylcdc&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;public class CookingProcess {\n    public Dish cook(String dishName) {\n        // 无论食材是否缺货，都执行固定步骤\n        // ...\n        return new Dish(dishName); // 返回做好的菜\n    }\n}\n&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs569twcfn77m8yxm&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;局限&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;：&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;list&quot;:{&quot;listId&quot;:&quot;6m5kzu06swn&quot;,&quot;isOrdered&quot;:true,&quot;level&quot;:0,&quot;listStyle&quot;:{&quot;format&quot;:&quot;decimal&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;%1.&quot;,&quot;align&quot;:&quot;left&quot;}},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs569uq13latv3oyg&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;一旦食材缺货，需要调用方自己判断是否可做这道菜，或修改烹饪流程。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;list&quot;:{&quot;listId&quot;:&quot;6m5kzu06swn&quot;,&quot;isOrdered&quot;:true,&quot;level&quot;:0,&quot;listStyle&quot;:{&quot;format&quot;:&quot;decimal&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;%1.&quot;,&quot;align&quot;:&quot;left&quot;}},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs569uhfyhyxr3ydh&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;每次需求变化，都得改动 cook 方法或调用代码，无法实现真正的“自适应”。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs64shpydl1uoqtn&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h4&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs569u71hx39oxwp8&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;改进示例：厨师是专业人士，能适配环境变化&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs569uh56nzqbvzvr&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;下面的 Chef 内部自行决定花生是否可用，如果缺货就用其他食材替代。这样，即使后续有更多类似变化（换新调料、临时供应商等），也能集中在 Chef 内部调整，无需改动客户端调用代码。&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;java&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;public class Chef {\n    // 模拟花生库存状态，可来自数据库或配置文件\n    private boolean peanutsInStock = false;\n\n    public Dish prepareDish(String dishName) {\n        if (\&quot;宫保鸡丁\&quot;.equals(dishName)) {\n            // 如果花生缺货，就用其他干果替代\n            if (!peanutsInStock) {\n                // ...在内部改用腰果或其他替代食材\n            } \n            // ...否则正常使用花生\n        }\n        // 其余烹饪逻辑\n        return new Dish(dishName); \n    }\n}\n&quot;,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs569u7256c9vjdsc&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;public class Chef {\n    // 模拟花生库存状态，可来自数据库或配置文件\n    private boolean peanutsInStock = false;\n\n    public Dish prepareDish(String dishName) {\n        if (\&quot;宫保鸡丁\&quot;.equals(dishName)) {\n            // 如果花生缺货，就用其他干果替代\n            if (!peanutsInStock) {\n                // ...在内部改用腰果或其他替代食材\n            } \n            // ...否则正常使用花生\n        }\n        // 其余烹饪逻辑\n        return new Dish(dishName); \n    }\n}\n&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs569ujipaplwli9h&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;好处&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;：&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;list&quot;:{&quot;listId&quot;:&quot;t0vpk94xdfe&quot;,&quot;isOrdered&quot;:true,&quot;level&quot;:0,&quot;listStyle&quot;:{&quot;format&quot;:&quot;decimal&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;%1.&quot;,&quot;align&quot;:&quot;left&quot;}},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs569u825b0t1o1gy&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;内聚性强&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;：所有判断和替代逻辑都放在 Chef 内部，外界无需关心具体做法。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;list&quot;:{&quot;listId&quot;:&quot;t0vpk94xdfe&quot;,&quot;isOrdered&quot;:true,&quot;level&quot;:0,&quot;listStyle&quot;:{&quot;format&quot;:&quot;decimal&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;%1.&quot;,&quot;align&quot;:&quot;left&quot;}},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs569uvlvx2ecvu3q&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;客户端调用不变&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;：无论花生库存状态如何变化，调用者依旧只需“一句命令”点餐，即可得到结果。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;list&quot;:{&quot;listId&quot;:&quot;t0vpk94xdfe&quot;,&quot;isOrdered&quot;:true,&quot;level&quot;:0,&quot;listStyle&quot;:{&quot;format&quot;:&quot;decimal&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;%1.&quot;,&quot;align&quot;:&quot;left&quot;}},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs569v086jwfrpka2&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;可扩展&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;：将来若再遇到更多类似场景（例如某调料临时售罄），只需修改 Chef，不会影响已有的调用代码。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;list&quot;:{&quot;listId&quot;:&quot;t0vpk94xdfe&quot;,&quot;isOrdered&quot;:true,&quot;level&quot;:0,&quot;listStyle&quot;:{&quot;format&quot;:&quot;decimal&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;%1.&quot;,&quot;align&quot;:&quot;left&quot;},&quot;extraData&quot;:{},&quot;isChecked&quot;:false,&quot;hideSymbol&quot;:false},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6yeoxq3rli44wmyemn&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h4&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs569v31mg0smbhoh&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;客户端调用示例：环境/需求变化，不影响客户端调用&quot;]]],[&quot;code&quot;,{&quot;syntax&quot;:&quot;java&quot;,&quot;theme&quot;:&quot;default&quot;,&quot;code&quot;:&quot;public class Main {\n    public static void main(String[] args) {\n        Chef chef = new Chef();\n        // 客户端只需告诉厨师要做“宫保鸡丁”\n        Dish dish = chef.prepareDish(\&quot;宫保鸡丁\&quot;);\n        // 即使花生缺货，Chef 会自动使用其他食材，无需调用方改动\n    }\n}\n&quot;,&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs569v7shkddyz6ag&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;public class Main {\n    public static void main(String[] args) {\n        Chef chef = new Chef();\n        // 客户端只需告诉厨师要做“宫保鸡丁”\n        Dish dish = chef.prepareDish(\&quot;宫保鸡丁\&quot;);\n        // 即使花生缺货，Chef 会自动使用其他食材，无需调用方改动\n    }\n}\n&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs569vae92itz4m89&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;无论花生库存如何，&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;客户端调用方式始终一致&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;：一个智能的 Chef 能在内部完成相应的“自适应”处理。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs88u7plt3cz3gorm&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;h3&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs9mvh3qgyvauqsrd&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;小结：命名即设计，把对象当做有生命的实体并能够自主决策行为&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs9mvico241umipa7&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;对象的命名，许多人往往只把它当作“好看”或“顺口”的问题，却忽视了它所暗含的业务理解深度与系统思维。当我们刻意避开 &quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;“-er”&quot;],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot; 结尾或“Service”、“utility”后缀等含糊标签，并让对象名真实反映其专业角色与业务职责时，能够有下述好处：&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;list&quot;:{&quot;listId&quot;:&quot;c8cd4jj7egm&quot;,&quot;isOrdered&quot;:true,&quot;level&quot;:0,&quot;listStyle&quot;:{&quot;format&quot;:&quot;decimal&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;%1.&quot;,&quot;align&quot;:&quot;left&quot;}},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs9mvi5ywslrkbt5l&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;减少误解&quot;]],[&quot;br&quot;,{&quot;type&quot;:&quot;textWrapping&quot;,&quot;data&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs9mvi4ljenc71hic&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;新成员或 AI 工具都能迅速理解类的意图，防止在补全或分析时走偏。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;list&quot;:{&quot;listId&quot;:&quot;c8cd4jj7egm&quot;,&quot;isOrdered&quot;:true,&quot;level&quot;:0,&quot;listStyle&quot;:{&quot;format&quot;:&quot;decimal&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;%1.&quot;,&quot;align&quot;:&quot;left&quot;}},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs9mvi79l40l75cpb&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;提升内聚&quot;]],[&quot;br&quot;,{&quot;type&quot;:&quot;textWrapping&quot;,&quot;data&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs9mvi55jhnb00w5y&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;各对象的逻辑边界更加清晰，改变一处功能不必连带修改全局。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;list&quot;:{&quot;listId&quot;:&quot;c8cd4jj7egm&quot;,&quot;isOrdered&quot;:true,&quot;level&quot;:0,&quot;listStyle&quot;:{&quot;format&quot;:&quot;decimal&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;%1.&quot;,&quot;align&quot;:&quot;left&quot;}},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs9mvirmqktj6ygml&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;易于扩展&quot;]],[&quot;br&quot;,{&quot;type&quot;:&quot;textWrapping&quot;,&quot;data&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs9mvi462yl5sm6qq&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;每个对象如同灵活的模块，可独立维护、替换或升级，而不影响整体架构。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;list&quot;:{&quot;listId&quot;:&quot;c8cd4jj7egm&quot;,&quot;isOrdered&quot;:true,&quot;level&quot;:0,&quot;listStyle&quot;:{&quot;format&quot;:&quot;decimal&quot;,&quot;text&quot;:&quot;%1.&quot;,&quot;align&quot;:&quot;left&quot;}},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs9mviacqpg11kbau&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;bold&quot;:true,&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;贴近业务&quot;]],[&quot;br&quot;,{&quot;type&quot;:&quot;textWrapping&quot;,&quot;data&quot;:{},&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs9mviftwxlcfc2lj&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;与产品或业务团队在概念层面保持一致，沟通效率提升，也减少了架构设计与业务需求间的鸿沟。&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xs9mvio752vz4giob&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;&quot;]]],[&quot;p&quot;,{&quot;uuid&quot;:&quot;m6xsbwnezutfgqy7qgm&quot;,&quot;ind&quot;:{&quot;firstLine&quot;:32}},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;text&quot;},[&quot;span&quot;,{&quot;data-type&quot;:&quot;leaf&quot;},&quot;在软件工程中，命名的重要性通常被忽视，但命名本身潜移默化影响我们的编码时的思维。只有当我们真正将对象视为拥有“尊严”与“自主决策能力”的实体时，才能更容易构建出一个高内聚、易扩展、符合业务本质的系统。&quot;]]]]" data-identifier-application__slash__x-cangjie-fragment="" data-identifier-application__slash__x-doc-key="mxPOGQdXgVxJnKa9">
<h3><span data-type="text">引言</span></h3>
<p><span data-type="text">在我所见过的项目中，大多数团队都倾向于“功能堆砌式”开发：需求来了就加逻辑或函数，却很少有人愿意花时间在设计上，尤其是在</span><span data-type="text">对象命名</span><span data-type="text">花费时间。这看似“快速实现需求”的方式，通常会对代码的可读性产生坏的影响，进而影响可维护性。</span></p>
<p><span data-type="text">一个好的对象命名</span><span data-type="text">并非只是让代码表面看起来整洁；它背后关系到人类和 AI 对系统的认知方式，也会在后续维护和迭代中形塑程序员以及 AI 工具的行为。换句话说，合适的命名不但决定了当前代码的优雅程度，也会潜移默化地影响未来对代码进行修改、扩展和重构时的思维路径与决策过程。</span></p>
<p><span data-type="text">下面，我们将通过几个示例，探讨如何通过合理的命名让对象真正体现业务含义与自主决策能力，而不是简单地扮演一个“被动执行者”。</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2><span data-type="text">一、避免以er或or结尾的对象命名</span></h2>
<p><span data-type="text">想象你走进一家餐厅。你会如何点餐？是要一份宫保鸡丁，还是告诉厨师：“你先放油，然后大火爆炒，然后再加调料”？如果你选择后者，那么对应到程序设计中，大概就是下面的写法：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code>class FoodMaker {
    public Dish Cook(List&lt;Step&gt; cookingSteps) {
        foreach(var step in cookingSteps) {
            ExecuteStep(step);
        }
        return new Dish();
    }
}

// 客户端代码
var maker = new FoodMaker();
var steps = new List&lt;Step&gt; {
    new Step("放油"), 
    new Step("大火爆炒"), 
    new Step("加调料")
};
var dish = maker.Cook(steps);</code></pre>
<p><span data-type="text">FoodMaker</span><span data-type="text"> ，它只是一个“做饭的人”或“执行器”，缺乏更多的“主观能动性”。这不仅增加了使用者在思维层面的负担，也显得对专业厨师的经验和技能不够尊重。</span></p>
<p><span data-type="text">相比之下，更贴近现实的方式是直接告诉对方“我需要一份宫保鸡丁”，厨师会根据自身经验和对食材的理解来完成这道菜。例如：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code>Chef {
    public Dish PrepareKungPaoChicken() {
        // 厨师知道如何准备这道菜
        return new KungPaoChicken();
    }
}

// 客户端代码
var chef = new Chef();
var dish = chef.PrepareKungPaoChicken();</code></pre>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span data-type="text">这样，</span><span data-type="text">Chef</span><span data-type="text"> 完整体现了专业性与自主性：</span></p>
<ul>
<li>
<div><span data-type="text">角色名称直接让人联想到一个可自主决策、拥有专业技能的人，而非简单的“烹饪器”。</span></div>
</li>
<li>
<div><span data-type="text">客户端只需表达“想要什么菜品”，而不必详述所有步骤。</span></div>
</li>
<li>
<div><span data-type="text">厨师可以根据具体的食材和场景调整做菜细节，为业务带来更多灵活性。</span></div>
</li>
</ul>
<p><span data-type="text">值得注意的是，很多以 </span><span data-type="text">“-er”</span><span data-type="text"> 或 </span><span data-type="text">“-or”</span><span data-type="text"> 结尾的对象（如 </span><span data-type="text">Manager、Processor、Controller、Validator</span><span data-type="text"> 等）常常会呈现出类似的“过程化”倾向：</span><span data-type="text">它们更多体现的是过程集合而非业务主体</span><span data-type="text">。当我们把命名改为更能传达专业身份或业务角色的名词时，往往会看到对象的“自我意识”和“主观能动性”随之提升，从而让整个系统的抽象层次更高、可维护性更好。</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2><span data-type="text">二、“Service”“Helper”“Utility”等后缀，更容易出现“上帝类”</span></h2>
<p><span data-type="text">在 AI 辅助编程工具的普及下，命名的清晰度在大型项目中显得尤为重要。模糊或过于抽象的名字不仅会增加团队成员、甚至让3个月后的你自己的认知负担，也会让 AI 在大量上下文中难以理解该对象的真实意图，甚至产生误导性补全。我们先来看一个不恰当的示例：</span></p>
<h3><span data-type="text">错误示例：RestaurantService 集合了一切琐事</span></h3>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code>public class RestaurantService {
    // 名称看似管理餐厅的一切，却混合了做饭、送餐和财务等完全不同的功能

    // 烹饪某道菜
    public void cookDish(String dishName) {
        
    }

    // 将菜品送到指定地址
    public void deliverFood(String address) {
        
    }

    // 安排厨师、服务员等员工的工作排班
    public void scheduleStaff(String staffName, String shift) {
        
    }

    // 处理餐厅每天或每月的财务结算
    public void handleBilling() {
        
    }
}</code></pre>
<h4><span data-type="text">问题：</span></h4>
<ol>
<li>
<div><span data-type="text">过于宽泛、抽象的类名</span><span data-type="text">：RestaurantService 似乎负责所有与餐厅相关的功能，从做菜到送餐再到财务结算，远远超出了单一职责的范围。</span></div>
</li>
<li>
<div><span data-type="text">对 AI 的误导</span><span data-type="text">：当 AI 工具在大规模代码库中搜索或补全时，见到“RestaurantService”可能以为这里面能找到任何与餐厅运营相关的逻辑，补全时也可能把更多不相干的功能（例如“采购食材”、“营销活动”等）一股脑塞进来，很容易导致上帝类。</span></div>
</li>
<li>
<div><span data-type="text">难以维护与扩展</span><span data-type="text">：假如将来要更改配送方式或财务记账逻辑，你会发现所有功能都耦合在同一个类里，一次改动极有可能波及整个系统。</span></div>
</li>
</ol>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3><span data-type="text">更合理的设计：按专业分工拆分类</span></h3>
<p><span data-type="text">要让代码更易读、更具可维护性，也让 AI 分析更准确，我们可以将“餐厅运营”按照现实场景拆分成多个专门对象，让每个类名更能“自证其职”：</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code>// 专注做菜逻辑
public class Kitchen {
    public void cookDish(String dishName) {
        // 专业处理做菜流程
    }
}

// 专注外卖配送
public class Delivery {
    public void deliverFood(String address) {
        // 专业处理送餐流程
    }
}

// 专注人员排班
public class StaffScheduling {
    public void schedule(String staffName, String shift) {
        // 专业处理员工排班
    }
}

// 专注财务结算
public class Billing {
    public void settleAccounts() {
        // 专门处理账务结算
    }
}</code></pre>
<h4><span data-type="text">好处：</span></h4>
<ol>
<li>
<div><span data-type="text">职责明确</span><span data-type="text">：Kitchen 只做烹饪，Delivery 只管外卖，StaffScheduling 只负责排班，Billing 用于结算财务。每个对象都有清晰的专业领域。</span></div>
</li>
<li>
<div><span data-type="text">易于理解</span><span data-type="text">：无论是人还是 AI，看到类名便能迅速推断其功能，降低误解。</span></div>
</li>
<li>
<div><span data-type="text">便于扩展</span><span data-type="text">：将来需要为“配送”加入自动调度，或为“做菜”加入菜单推荐逻辑，也可以在对应的类中单独迭代，而不会影响其他模块。</span></div>
</li>
<li>
<div><span data-type="text">匹配现实场景</span><span data-type="text">：现实中，餐厅的后厨、配送员、人事、财务等各司其职，软件设计中也应遵循类似原则。</span></div>
</li>
</ol>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2><span data-type="text">三、对象命名与对象“智能”属性：当环境变化时仍能自适应</span></h2>
<p><span data-type="text">现实生活中，若宫保鸡丁的必需食材（例如花生）突然缺货，真正的专业厨师会主动寻找替代食材，而不会要求顾客重新“下指令”或“换个点餐方式”。同理，在软件中，一个设计得足够“智能”的对象，也应该能在外部条件或业务需求变化时，自行调整内部逻辑，而不影响调用者的使用方式。</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h4><span data-type="text">示例：面相过程的烹饪</span></h4>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code>public class CookingProcess {
    public Dish cook(String dishName) {
        // 无论食材是否缺货，都执行固定步骤
        // ...
        return new Dish(dishName); // 返回做好的菜
    }
}</code></pre>
<p><span data-type="text">局限</span><span data-type="text">：</span></p>
<ol>
<li>
<div><span data-type="text">一旦食材缺货，需要调用方自己判断是否可做这道菜，或修改烹饪流程。</span></div>
</li>
<li>
<div><span data-type="text">每次需求变化，都得改动 cook 方法或调用代码，无法实现真正的“自适应”。</span></div>
</li>
</ol>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h4><span data-type="text">改进示例：厨师是专业人士，能适配环境变化</span></h4>
<p><span data-type="text">下面的 Chef 内部自行决定花生是否可用，如果缺货就用其他食材替代。这样，即使后续有更多类似变化（换新调料、临时供应商等），也能集中在 Chef 内部调整，无需改动客户端调用代码。</span></p>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code>public class Chef {
    // 模拟花生库存状态，可来自数据库或配置文件
    private boolean peanutsInStock = false;

    public Dish prepareDish(String dishName) {
        if ("宫保鸡丁".equals(dishName)) {
            // 如果花生缺货，就用其他干果替代
            if (!peanutsInStock) {
                // ...在内部改用腰果或其他替代食材
            } 
            // ...否则正常使用花生
        }
        // 其余烹饪逻辑
        return new Dish(dishName); 
    }
}</code></pre>
<p><span data-type="text">好处</span><span data-type="text">：</span></p>
<ol>
<li>
<div><span data-type="text">内聚性强</span><span data-type="text">：所有判断和替代逻辑都放在 Chef 内部，外界无需关心具体做法。</span></div>
</li>
<li>
<div><span data-type="text">客户端调用不变</span><span data-type="text">：无论花生库存状态如何变化，调用者依旧只需“一句命令”点餐，即可得到结果。</span></div>
</li>
<li>
<div><span data-type="text">可扩展</span><span data-type="text">：将来若再遇到更多类似场景（例如某调料临时售罄），只需修改 Chef，不会影响已有的调用代码。</span></div>
</li>
<li>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
</li>
</ol>
<h4><span data-type="text">客户端调用示例：环境/需求变化，不影响客户端调用</span></h4>
<pre class="highlighter-hljs"><code>public class Main {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Chef chef = new Chef();
        // 客户端只需告诉厨师要做“宫保鸡丁”
        Dish dish = chef.prepareDish("宫保鸡丁");
        // 即使花生缺货，Chef 会自动使用其他食材，无需调用方改动
    }
}</code></pre>
<p><span data-type="text">无论花生库存如何，</span><span data-type="text">客户端调用方式始终一致</span><span data-type="text">：一个智能的 Chef 能在内部完成相应的“自适应”处理。</span></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3><span data-type="text">小结：命名即设计，把对象当做有生命的实体并能够自主决策行为</span></h3>
<p><span data-type="text">对象的命名，许多人往往只把它当作“好看”或“顺口”的问题，却忽视了它所暗含的业务理解深度与系统思维。当我们刻意避开 </span><span data-type="text">“-er”</span><span data-type="text"> 结尾或“Service”、“utility”后缀等含糊标签，并让对象名真实反映其专业角色与业务职责时，能够有下述好处：</span></p>
<ol>
<li>
<div><span data-type="text">减少误解</span><br data-path="48,0,0,1"><span data-type="text">新成员或 AI 工具都能迅速理解类的意图，防止在补全或分析时走偏。</span></div>
</li>
<li>
<div><span data-type="text">提升内聚</span><br data-path="48,1,0,1"><span data-type="text">各对象的逻辑边界更加清晰，改变一处功能不必连带修改全局。</span></div>
</li>
<li>
<div><span data-type="text">易于扩展</span><br data-path="48,2,0,1"><span data-type="text">每个对象如同灵活的模块，可独立维护、替换或升级，而不影响整体架构。</span></div>
</li>
<li>
<div><span data-type="text">贴近业务</span><br data-path="48,3,0,1"><span data-type="text">与产品或业务团队在概念层面保持一致，沟通效率提升，也减少了架构设计与业务需求间的鸿沟。</span></div>
</li>
</ol>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><span data-type="text">在软件工程中，命名的重要性通常被忽视，但命名本身潜移默化影响我们的编码时的思维。只有当我们真正将对象视为拥有“尊严”与“自主决策能力”的实体时，才能更容易构建出一个高内聚、易扩展、符合业务本质的系统。</span></p>
</article>
</div>
<div class="clear"></div>

            </div>
